Description: Upper body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with trace of centre of lotus flower in added red; exterior: at rim (now lost) part of band of reversed 'z's above two dilute lines; below, pendant triangle as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0571) (phase 2)
